title: [Bug]: Filter by keyword, for Planner, moved and is now missing in the application.
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

Not applicable

### Describe the bug

In the Planner the keyword search has moved out from the "Filters" menu to the far left side of that row and is now represented by a magnifying glass. In addition the "Filters" and "Group by Bucket" menus have moved below the "Grid", "Board", etc... selections. As a result the ability to search via the new keyword search option is not present within this application.

The new view is observable in the website.

### What package are you using?

deb

### Version

v1.12.7

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
1.Open Teams-for-Linux
2.Go to a tab with a Planner app.
3. I go to Board view but that should not be relevant.
4.Observe the lack of a keyword search option.
...
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown
1. To see the keyword search option within the Planner tab.
2.
3.
...
```

### Debug

```markdown
teams-for-linux --webDebug --logConfig='{}'

Nothing interesting here.
```

### Additional context

_No response_
